ygData.subject: RE: griffenes... was Tracking
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to the wood bridge, then go north to zone edge.  Then go west to the named treant. Give him that 10 pound case of jumjum juice you have been carrying around
ygData.messageBody:
Go to the wood bridge, then go north to zone edge. Then go west to the
named treant. Give him that 10 pound case of jumjum juice you have been
carrying around since level 12. Look around a bit and you will see a little
ruin tower thing sticking up from the ground. Camp just south of that and
you will see 'fawns (mostly) and 'feenes spawning between you and the
treant. We kill everything that flys by - well not Grim - we run from Grim.
Its far north side - about mid zone. Not hard to find.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 35th Song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. dont use AE - Xanthouls (sp? the named tree) is a mean caster.

p.s.s. actually i have had better luck hunting off the gypsys. pure
superstition but i think more charms are looted near them


-----Original Message-----
From: CYR, Thierry [mailto:tcyr@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 12:01 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: griffenes... was [eqbards] Tracking


From: "CYR, Thierry" <tcyr@...>

speaking of which, at some point on this list, someone posted the loc of a
spawn spot of a griffene, im so sick of wandering around aimlessly with only
griffawns spawning on me, and the few times i do get a griffene it doesnt
have the charm. gets annoying to switch bracers all the time so that the
blue shows instead of my silver plated one.

Anyone able to help me out by giving me a loc of a spawn spot of these
annoying critters to find

Minkin
Sol ro

>
> were unlucky enough to show up on our tracking. There was even a Guide
> watching us for part of the night, I guess someone felt we were too

> 50th
